Articles.Title: Dwayne Johnson Returning in ‘Fast and Furious’ Solo Movie, Says He and Vin Diesel ‘Put All the Past Behind Us’
Articles.Description: After initially declining to rejoin the franchise, the actor made a cameo during the credits scene of Fast X
